Material used.Description: Comparison between fibroblasts from patient with PINK1 mutation and normal controls.

Readout description.Result Description: Patient fibroblasts showed reduced respiratory activity, lower respiratory control ratio, and increased reliance on glycolytic production compared to controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal respiratory activity and control ratio in control fibroblasts.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced respiratory activity and control ratio in patient fibroblasts.
